question.long: Do GMOs have an impact on consumer health?

description: Results from studies evaluating the effect of food products containing GMOs on human health.

no_consensus.description: The literature has not yet reached a consensus on the effects of GMOs on human health

yes.description: The literature suggests that GMOs have an impact on human health

no.description: The literature suggests that GMOs have no effects on human health

yes.description: The results of the paper suggest that the GMOs evaluated have an impact on human health

yes_unlike_literature.description: The results of the paper suggest that the GMOs evaluated have an impact on human health, unlike what is reported in the literature

no_unlike_literature.description: The results of the paper show no significant impact on human health of the GMOs evaluated, unlike what is reported in the literature

no.description: The results of the paper show no significant impact on human health of the GMOs evaluated

papers.title: Evaluation of a brief intervention for educating school children in awareness of physical and sexual abuse
papers.quote: Relative to controls, children who received the program showed an overall increase in knowledge of correct actions to take in the event of potential or actual abuse.
